page.title: 10WILBERFOSS THE POLICEMAN.
page.content: Wilberfoss does not have its own policeman at present, a fact bemoaned by some and cheered by others.The policeman responsible for covering the village lives in Stamford Bridge,some 4 miles away. If needed he can quickly arrive in his ubiquitous panda car. Asked about the job of a rural policeman he said that he enjoys it as it is possible to get to know people well. The most common crime he has to deal with is burglary,there being many desirable properties on his patch. The most serious crime he has dealt with was a murder a couple of years ago. Generally life is much quieter in the country, but at Christ- mas he has to be on the look-out for turkey rustlers and dishonest members of the York citizenry who frequent local forest plantations by night in order to dig up a free Xmas tree!
